comment: we zoom all the time but i last saw my friends in person at the end of october (when we brought our dogs together to meet in our yard lol) and everyone was negative but even then no one took their masks off and we were outside and apart the entire time
amr:
# ::snt we zoom all the time but i last saw my friends in person at the end of october (when we brought our dogs together to meet in our yard lol) and everyone was negative but even then no one took their masks off and we were outside and apart the entire time
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (z / zoom-01

            :frequency (t / time
                  :mod (a / all)))
      :ARG2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (s / see-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / i)
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 ii
                                    :ARG2 (f / friend)))
                        :mod (l / last)
                        :mod (ii2 / in-person)
                        :time (e / end-01
                              :ARG1 (f2 / festival
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "october")))
                        :time (b / bring-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (d / dog
                                    :poss w)
                              :ARG4 (t2 / together)
                              :purpose (m / meet-03
                                    :ARG0 d
                                    :location (y / yard
                                          :poss w))
                              :ARG2-of (l2 / laugh-01
                                    :ARG0 ii
                                    :manner (l3 / loud))))
                  :op2 (n2 / negative-03
                        :ARG0 (e2 / everyone)))
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (t3 / take-off-07
                        :ARG0 (n3 / no-one)
                        :ARG1 (m2 / mask
                              :poss n3))
                  :op2 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (b2 / be-located-at-91
                              :ARG1 w
                              :ARG2 (o / outside))
                        :op2 (b3 / be-located-at-91
                              :ARG1 w
                              :ARG2 (a5 / apart))
                        :duration (t4 / time
                              :mod (e3 / entire))))))

comment: i do want to invite my grad cohort (4 people) to celebrate me getting married, once they also all get their final doses and have waited ofc, but it'd still be out in our big yard (even though its february lol) and actually physically distanced
amr:
# ::snt i do want to invite my grad cohort (4 people) to celebrate me getting married, once they also all get their final doses and have waited ofc, but it'd still be out in our big yard (even though its february lol) and actually physically distanced
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (w / want-01

                        :poss ii)

                  :time (o / once

                                    :ARG0 c2
                                    :ARG1 (d / dose
                                          :mod (f / final)
                                          :poss c2)
                                    :mod (a2 / also))
                              :op2 (w2 / wait-01
                                    :ARG1 c2
                                    :mod a2)))))
      :ARG2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (o2 / out-06

                        :mod (b / big)

                  :mod (s / still))

                  :manner (p2 / physical)
                  :ARG1-of (a4 / actual-02))))
